Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Harlem (FP)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (FP) due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (FP) due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
